name: Medevac Hero
description:
This exciting simulator takes keen navigation, strategy, and nimble fingers to help save and rescue injured military personnel trapped in hostile enemy zones.

The objective is to rescue the injured and bring them to safety which is the medical facility.

Each level presents unique obstacles, challenging gameplay, and intuitive strategic thinking to complete. Medevac Hero features a plethora of levels, and easy to learn, difficult to master controls!

The excitement and replay value will keep you competing against your friends and trying to achieve 3 stars on every levels! See if you can get the best time, and have what it takes to be a true master! Your country needs you to step up and become the next Medevac Hero!

Features:
* Many Different Levels with varying difficulty
* Optimized for new computers and HD Graphics!
* Works great on older machines as well!
* Allows customization of detail settings
* Gorgeous hand-crafted 3D graphics and levels
* Intuitive controls with keyboard/mouse interactivity
* Realistic Special Effects, including Visuals and Sound FX
